result.title: Final Version D5.1 KPI's
result.description: Technology requirements will be defined and subsequent data is to be gathered.Each demonstration site is to have its own set of KPI's defined from the beginning and reported.For the software app, different set of KPI's are to be adapted and contend with throughout the project length.Method of evaluation will be determined accordingly and covered in the form of areport which will be handed over as a deliverable.

result.title: Report on co-design process and implementation of pilots
result.description: This report will detail each pilot action and how each pilot action was implemented within the local context Each pilot action partner will provide a detailed description of the stakeholders involved a stepbystep description of the activities implemented the challenges each pilot action faced and a description of the materials that were developed The WP4 leads will provide guidance for structuring the key information and will in turn edit the key findings into a report

result.title: Pilot action materials
result.description: Each pilot partner will produce online resources and materials that would enable the future replication of the pilot actions Our commitment to participatory approaches means that the shape that the resources and materials might take will be led by our stakeholders However indicative forms of material might include textbased guidance and instructions for workshops and activities visual or artistic endeavours digital film photovoice activities and briefings

result.title: NEW ABC app
result.description: This app will connect microlevel stakeholders to each other and facilitate reachout to other groups of stakeholders in order to make their voices heard across schools sectors and communities This is envisioned as a dynamic exchange from which all members of the community can reach out to each other and gain new knowledge or insight

result.title: Report on ethical, legislative, political and social context of the partners' countries
result.description: Report on ethical legislative political and social context of the partners countries will provide the state of art background for the cocreation process enabling to map differences and similarities in all participating countries and distinguish all shortcomings that need to be overcame by projects action

result.title: Partner list for Global NEW ABC network
result.description: Following the identification of relevant projects in addition to those specified in the current proposal this contact list will be generated based on the establishment of communications with and expressions of interest from partners from existing H2020 projects in related topics to participate in the Global NEW ABC network

result.title: Online pilot action resources and materials using different mediums
result.description: After the analysis of the requirements for the implementation in the second testing (stakeholder analysis), pilot activities will be adapted for the second testing in other countries and contexts. The materials will be created using different mediums: audio, video, etc. and will be submitted as a deliverable.
